sourcesContent:
import { React, useState } from 'react'; import '../../assets/style/FlightRecord.css'; import { toast } from 'react-toastify'; import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css'; import Departure from '../../assets/images/departures.png'; import Arrival from '../../assets/images/arrivals.png'; import Plane from '../../assets/images/plane.png'; import FlightService from '../../services/FlightService'; import { calculateDuration, formatDate } from '../../utils/util.js'; const FlightRecord = ({ flight }) => { const [detailsVisible, setDetailsVisible] = useState(false); const { flightName, flightNumber, scheduleDateTime, actualOffBlockTime, expectedTimeGateOpen, expectedTimeBoarding, estimatedLandingTime, prefixIATA, aircraftRegistration, departureCode, route: { destinations }, aircraftType, farePrice, tripType } = flight; const flightDuration = calculateDuration(estimatedLandingTime || expectedTimeBoarding || actualOffBlockTime, scheduleDateTime); const boardingTime = expectedTimeBoarding ? new Date(expectedTimeBoarding).toLocaleTimeString() : 'To be announced' const gateOpens = expectedTimeGateOpen ? new Date(expectedTimeGateOpen).toLocaleTimeString() : 'To be announced'; const landingTime = estimatedLandingTime ? new Date(estimatedLandingTime).toLocaleTimeString() : 'To Be Announced' const estimatedLanding = formatDate(estimatedLandingTime || expectedTimeBoarding || actualOffBlockTime) const toggleDetails = () => { setDetailsVisible(!detailsVisible); }; return (

{departureCode}

-

{destinations[0]}

Departure

{formatDate(scheduleDateTime)}

Airport: {departureCode}

e.target.src = ''} />

{flightDuration}

Arrival

{estimatedLanding}

Airport: {destinations[0]}

Price: ${farePrice || '0'}

{tripType}

{detailsVisible && (
Boarding

Boarding Time: {boardingTime}

Gate Opens: {gateOpens}

Landing: {landingTime}

Aircraft

Registration: {aircraftRegistration}

Type: {aircraftType?.iataMain}

Flight

Number: {flightNumber}

Name: {flightName}

Type: {aircraftType?.iataMain}

)}
); }; export default FlightRecord;
